bug.author: yaroslavvb
bug.description: To reproduce -- go to <denchmark-link:https://app.wandb.ai/yaroslavvb/nccl_bench?workspace=user-yaroslavvb>https://app.wandb.ai/yaroslavvb/nccl_bench?workspace=user-yaroslavvb</denchmark-link> and try to add Filter by name. The result is empty no matter what you put for filter value <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23068/59882380-ecc82e00-9366-11e9-922c-48aab00c0f97.gif></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 1.00. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/wandb/client>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Yep, definitely a bug in our backend filtering logic. I'm tracking this internally for a fix.
